description:
Meal replacement bar with organic acai berries, raspberries, dark chocolate and live greens blended with whole nuts, grains and other good-for-you ingredients.

  • 100% vegan and trans-fat free
  • Low glycemic index grain sweeteners
  • Ingredients: brown rice syrup, oats, peanut buttery (peanuts), dates, sunflower seeds, chocolate liquor drops, raisins, cashews, flax seeds, sesame seeds, almonds, crisp brown rice, dried cane syrup, hemp seeds, raspberry pure, expeller pressed canola oil, vegetable glycerin, acai powder, dried pineapple, dried cane syrup, dried papaya. rice syrup, wheat grass, barley grass, alfalfa grass, oat flour, pumpkin seed, molasses, Arabic gum raspberry flavouring, citric acid, salt. natural tocopherols and ascorbic acid (added to present flavour), rosemary extract
  • Allergens, contains: almonds, cashews, peanuts, sesame, wheat, oats and barley
name: Probar Superfood Slam Bar (Meal)
